Join the Winter Data Science School

Explore Next-Gen AI, Network with Experts, and Gain Practical Skills.

February 24-25, 2024

EMINES, UM6P: Université Mohammed VI Polytechnique, Ben Guerir

info@datasciencewinter.com

Register Now View Program

About the Event

Our Winter Data Science School focuses on Next-Gen AI. We aim to provide deep insights into the latest techniques, foster networking, and offer practical skills.

Stay connected through LinkedIn!

LinkedIn

Key Features of the Event

Keynote Presentations

Explore the latest advancements in Next-Gen AI with world-class experts.

Business Case Studies

Learn how AI is transforming industries with real-world case studies.

Research Poster Presentations

Discover cutting-edge AI research in our interactive poster sessions.

Panel Discussions

Engage in dynamic discussions on the future of Next-Gen AI.

Who Should Attend

This event is designed for anyone passionate about the future of AI. Whether you're looking to dive deep into Next-Gen AI or expand your network, this is the perfect opportunity.

PhD and Master's Students

Stay ahead of the curve in AI research and innovations.

Engineers & Data Scientists

Engage with cutting-edge technologies and apply them to real-world problems.

Entrepreneurs & Innovators

Learn how AI is transforming industries and how to leverage it for new ventures.

Industry Professionals

Network with leading AI professionals and discover the future of AI in business.

Venue

The winter school will take place on February 24-25, 2024, in the main room of the Conference Center at EMINES, UM6P: Université Mohammed VI Polytechnique, Ben Guerir
